duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in support of SEC, NYSE and other securities filings, including current and periodic reports, Section 16 filings, registration statements, proxy statements, and other regulatory filings and reports.
Review quarterly earnings materials, company disclosures, and ensure compliance with applicable securities laws and NYSE regulations.
Review agreements, materials, and disclosure documents related to corporate financing transactions.
Prepare materials for Board of Directors, committee and shareholder meetings including resolutions, minutes, and D&O questionnaires.
Support SOX compliance matters and maintain the Company's insider trading compliance program, share ownership policy, and other governance-related policies.
Assist with equity plan administration, executive compensation matters, corporate development activities, and general corporate matters.
Perform other job-related functions as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctorate from an ABA-accredited law school, and member in good standing of the Florida Bar or ability and willingness to register as a Florida in-house counsel.
